title: BADecker
author: BADecker
content: The next thing they will do after killing their own troops is, blame it on Russia. Think of it. They can't win against Russia, so they help Russia by killing their own people.Madness! Ukraine Gov't Files Bill to allow Officers to KILL Surrendering Ukraine Army Troops Quote from: https://halturnerradioshow.com/index.php/en/news-page/world/madness-ukraine-gov-t-files-bill-to-allow-officers-to-kill-surrendering-ukraine-army-troopsDeputies from Ukraine President Volodymyr Zelensky's party have proposed a new law to allow commanders to KILL their soldiers in order to stop mass surrender by Ukrainian troops and flight from their positions.The bill has the number 7351 and was published on the official website of the Verkhovna Rada, which is the Ukraine legislature as shown below:...An automated Ukraine-to-English translation, done online, shows the details:...So while one part of the Bill talks about doing "no harm" the very next part of the Bill says a Commander can give an order to a subordinate to USE WEAPONS to stop the troops.  i.e. Kill them.   They REMOVED the section that previously read "if do not cause death ! ! ! "...

They can't win against Russia, so they help Russia by killing their own people.Madness! Ukraine Gov't Files Bill to allow Officers to KILL Surrendering Ukraine Army Troops Quote from: https://halturnerradioshow.com/index.php/en/news-page/world/madness-ukraine-gov-t-files-bill-to-allow-officers-to-kill-surrendering-ukraine-army-troopsDeputies from Ukraine President Volodymyr Zelensky's party have proposed a new law to allow commanders to KILL their soldiers in order to stop mass surrender by Ukrainian troops and flight from their positions.The bill has the number 7351 and was published on the official website of the Verkhovna Rada, which is the Ukraine legislature as shown below:...An automated Ukraine-to-English translation, done online, shows the details:...So while one part of the Bill talks about doing "no harm" the very next part of the Bill says a Commander can give an order to a subordinate to USE WEAPONS to stop the troops.  i.e. Kill them.   They REMOVED the section that previously read "if do not cause death ! ! ! "... This is quite absurd. On the surface it will look like they are charging the armies to not back down from the war, fight till the finish and defend their motherland but deep down, this is high profile suicide. Russia have everything to finish this war and if the Ukrainians see that they are losing more, and decide to concede, why impose such a heartless bill on them?
